title: GOOD OMENS REACTION | Hard Times| Episode 3
author: Ana Colli
comment: I adore how hard they leaned into the 'ship. Best part of the show by far. The Horsemen and the Them were a bit of a letdown, sadly.

A scene was cut out from the series was when Azi opened his new book shop 😭 Crowley came to visit with flowers and chocolate but upon standing outside he overheard Gabriel telling Azi that he's done his duties well and it's time to go back to heaven. Crowley then left and made a scene to trick Gabriel into think Azi is still needed on earth so he can stay 😂💕 they're absolutely adorable

I loved this episode just as much as you did. I mean, holy hell! I saw some people saying they didn't really understand why there were 20 minutes of Aziraphele and Crowley going around history, but just because they didn't really understand the whole "character building" thing.

Some book fans: ship Aziraphale and Crowley
Gaiman: tries to stay neutral on the whole ineffable husbands thing in the show
The audience of the show: ships them, but even harder
Everybody when they start to "break up" - N O
description:
